text: Fashion is not something that exists in dresses only. Fashion is in the sky, in the street; fashion has to do with ideas, the way we live, what is happening.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Elegance is not about being noticed, it's about being remembered.
author: Giorgio Armani

text: Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Fashion is about dressing according to what’s fashionable. Style is more about being yourself.
author: Oscar de la Renta

text: The best things in life are free. The second-best are very expensive.
author: Coco Chanel

text: You can never be overdressed or overeducated.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Fashion is like eating, you shouldn't stick to the same menu.
author: Kenzo Takada

text: I don't do fashion, I am fashion.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Fashion is what you buy, style is what you do with it.
author: Unknown

text: Fashion is about dreaming and making other people dream.
author: Donatella Versace

text: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

text: I like my money right where I can see it…hanging in my closet.
author: Carrie Bradshaw

text: Fashion is the armor to survive the reality of everyday life.
author: Bill Cunningham

text: I think there is beauty in everything. What ‘normal’ people perceive as ugly, I can usually see something of beauty in it.
author: Alexander McQueen

text: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Life is a party, dress like it.
author: Audrey Hepburn

text: Fashion is about suspense, surprise, and fantasy. It’s not about rules.
author: Walt Disney

text: I have always believed that fashion was not only to make women more beautiful, but also to reassure them, give them confidence.
author: Yves Saint Laurent

text: You can have anything you want in life if you dress for it.
author: Edith Head

text: Fashion is the most powerful art there is. It’s movement, design, and architecture all in one. It shows the world who we are and who we’d like to be.
author: Blair Waldorf

text: Fashion is like a language. Some know it, some learn it, some never will – like an instinct.
author: Edith Head

text: Style is a way to say who you are without having to speak.
author: Rachel Zoe

text: You either know fashion or you don't.
author: Anna Wintour

text: Fashion should be a form of escapism and not a form of imprisonment.
author: Alexander McQueen

text: You can’t buy happiness, but you can buy a new outfit, and that’s kind of the same thing.
author: Unknown

text: Elegance is the only beauty that never fades.
author: Audrey Hepburn

text: Fashion is not something that you can buy. It is something that is reflected in the way you talk, the way you walk, and the way you carry yourself.
author: Unknown

text: Fashion is the art of expression that allows you to show the world who you are and what you stand for.
author: Unknown

text: I don't design clothes. I design dreams.
author: Ralph Lauren

text: I think there is beauty in everything. What ‘normal’ people would perceive as ugly, I can usually see something of beauty in it.
author: Alexander McQueen

text: Fashion is a trend. Style lives within a person.
author: Oscar de la Renta

text: Fashion is very important. It is life-enhancing and, like everything that gives pleasure, it is worth doing well.
author: Vivienne Westwood

text: Fashion is architecture: it is a matter of proportions.
author: Coco Chanel

text: I always find beauty in things that are odd and imperfect – they are much more interesting.
author: Marc Jacobs

text: To be successful, one has to be one of three bees – the queen bee, the hardest working bee, or the bee that does not fit in.
author: Suzy Kassem

text: Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them.
author: Marc Jacobs

text: Fashion is not necessarily about labels. It's not about brands. It's about something else that comes from within you.
author: Ralph Lauren

text: Fashion is a tool. It allows you to express yourself, your mood, and your personality.
author: Unknown

text: People will stare. Make it worth their while.
author: Harry Winston

text: The most important thing to remember is that you can wear all the greatest clothes and all the greatest shoes, but you’ve got to have a good spirit on the inside. That’s what’s really going to make you look like you’re ready to rock the world.
author: Alicia Keys

text: I don't believe in fashion. I believe in costume. Life is too short to be the same person every day.
author: Stephanie Perkins

text: The joy of dressing is an art.
author: John Galliano

text: Fashion is a way to say who you are without having to speak.
author: Unknown

text: I love being a woman and I love the power we have.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

text: You can never take too much care over the choice of your shoes. Too many women think that they are unimportant, but the real proof of an elegant woman is what is on her feet.
author: Christian Dior

text: Life is too short to wear boring clothes.
author: Unknown

text: Dress shabbily and they remember the dress; dress impeccably and they remember the woman.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Fashion is not something that exists in dresses only. Fashion is in the sky, in the street; fashion has to do with ideas, the way we live, what is happening.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Fashion is a way to express yourself without having to speak.
author: Rachel Zoe

text: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
author: Coco Chanel

text: You can't be ugly and have a beautiful soul. It's the other way around – you can't have an ugly soul and be beautiful.
author: Unknown

text: Fashion is like eating, you shouldn't stick to the same menu.
author: Kenzo Takada

text: Fashion is what you're offered four times a year by designers. And style is what you choose.
author: Lauren Hutton

text: The best things in life are free. The second-best are very expensive.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Elegance is the only beauty that never fades.
author: Audrey Hepburn

text: Fashion should be a form of escapism and not a form of imprisonment.
author: Alexander McQueen

text: I don't do fashion, I am fashion.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Fashion is a way to say who you are without having to speak.
author: Rachel Zoe

text: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci
